title: I cannot get a hextech crate even when i get an s or above and it shows I can get crates
body: Is it that my account is glitched? is the crate system glitched? I am not getting a single crate even after I just got 3 S's in a row in three games. All I got was a key fragment or a token. Will anyone tell me what is wrong?

replies.body:
Have you already earned a hextech chest on this champion this season? You're only able to earn a single chest per champion each season. You can find more about the Hextech loot system and earning chests in our [**Hextech Crafting Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
